name: iDoctor Mobile
body:
### Welcome to iDoctor Mobile!

We are a phone repair company based in Lafayette, Indiana. While we specialize in Apple devices including iPhone, iPad, and Mac computers, we also repair PCs, Android devices, and much more.

We buy and sell phones, chargers, and more! Come check our inventory!

We are located at 518 Sagamore Parkway N, Lafayette, Indiana, inside of the Mama Ines Mexican Bakery.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
